Package Ex2_EranReuvenPkg

Class ServletVote

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • Ex2_EranReuvenPkg.ServletVote
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    @WebServlet(name="ServletVote",
            urlPatterns="/ServletVote")
public class ServletVote
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Servlet: ServletVote Description: This servlet handle requests of votes. As we know, a client can only vote once. So This servlet is a bridge to 'ServletResults'. before calling and post the vote value, ServletVote checks if theres any cookie that we sign, if no - the client can vote! if yes, we will not forward the request, and the cilent will get an empty JSON value, so we catch it there and we know to print that way to the client that he already voted.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • ServletVote

        public ServletVote()

    • Method Detail

      • VoteValidate

        private boolean VoteValidate​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Function: VoteValidate
        Parameters:
        req - - gets the request object of the client
        Returns:
        - returns bool value: true - the client can vote. false - the client cannot vote. Description: This function will iterate over the cookies array of the request. If we find the assign cookie that we put once a client votes, we will get false. if none of it found, we will get true (pass to continue and forwarding to ServletResults)

      • doPost

        protected void doPost​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Function doPost
        Overrides:
        doPost in class javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        Parameters:
        request - - client request
        response - - server response to the client Description: This function called by 'post' request to ServletVote. It will checks if the client already voted (VoteValidate function) If no - we will do nothing so the client gets empty Json Object. If yes - we will create and attach the cookie to the response. Then, we forward the request to 'ServletResults'. (Notice: since the request is 'post', it will also call 'doPost' in ServletResults.) isOk attribute is to ensure that a client will not send directly post request to ServletResults Exceptions: We try and catch if we have any ServletException or IOException.
